ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَٰنَكَ لَا عِلْمَ لَنَآ إِلَّا مَا عَلَّمْتَنَآ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلْعَلِيمُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'Glory be to You! We have no knowledge except what You have taught us. You are the All- Knowing, the All-Wise.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And they said: "Glory to You (O Lord), knowledge we have none except what You have given us, for You are all-knowing and all-wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They replied, "Glory be to You. You alone are free from defect. We possess only that much knowledge which You have given us. Indeed You alone are All-Knowing and All-Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The angels replied, "You are glorious indeed! We do not know more than what You have taught us. You alone are All-knowing and All-wise".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “Purity is to You! We do not have any knowledge except what You have taught us! Indeed You only are the All Knowing, the Wise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They (angels) said: "Glory is to You, we have no knowledge except what you have taught us. Verily, You are the Knower, the Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Glory be to Thee! we have no knowledge but that which Thou hast taught us; surely Thou art the Knowing, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Glory be to Thee! We know not save what Thou hast taught us. Surely Thou art the All-knowing, the All-wise.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Be glorified! We have no knowledge saving that which Thou hast taught us. Lo! Thou, only Thou, art the Knower, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They said, "Glory be to You; we have no knowledge except whatever You have taught us. You are the All Knowing, the All Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: hallowed be Thou no knowledge is our save that which Thou hast taught us, verily Thou! Thou art the Knower, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Immaculate are You! We have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed You are the All-knowing, the All-wise.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "Glory to Thee, of knowledge We have none, save what Thou Hast taught us: In truth it is Thou Who art perfect in knowledge and wisdom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They (angels) said: "Glory be to You, we have no knowledge except what you have taught us. Verily, it is You, the All-Knower, the All-Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Exaltations to You,' they replied, 'we have no knowledge except that which You have taught us. You are indeed the Knowing, the Wise'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “Glory be to You! We have no knowledge except what You have taught us. It is you who are the Knowledgeable, the Wise.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Exalted are You; we have no knowledge except what You have taught us. Indeed, it is You who is the Knowing, the Wise."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:32] They said, ‘Glory be to You!, exalting You above that any should object to You, We know not except what   You have taught us. Surely You are (innaka anta emphasises the [preceding suffixed pronoun] kāf) the Knower, Wise’, from whose knowledge and wisdom nothing escapes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They said: Be glorified!), we repent to you of what we said (We have no knowledge saving that which Thou hast taught us), inspired us with. (Lo! Thou, only Thou, art the Knower) of us and of them (the Wise) regarding our matters and theirs.
